website_summaries.verdict: A quality serving tray that is ideal for desserts, and looks lovely on display.
pros: All the quality you’d expect from Spode dishware, with a beautiful holiday theme
High gloss finish and bright, vibrant colors
Perfect for serving cookies and other small desserts
Alternatively, the tray makes an aesthetic decor piece
cons: Hand washing is recommended for this tray

customer_reviews.title: If Giving as a Gift, Plz Read!
customer_reviews.text: First, the Spode Christmas Tree large platter is authentic! It's also an incredible value ($21) compared to Macy's and other department stores ($55+). It comes boxed in the same red Spode box that Spode has been using for decades. It's also perfect for gifting. However, if you are gifting this item, be aware that there is a MSRP ($63) sticker on the outside of the box BUT also a second sticker on the back of the platter itself.
customer_reviews.author: BBTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: I Love Spode Chistmas Tree
customer_reviews.text: I love Spode Christmas Tree. My Mom started my collection with gifts of it many years ago. I have decided to gift myself one piece each Christmas, and this was one i did not have and thought looked like a beautiful add to my collection. I am very glad i did. It's a lovely piece, do not think of it as just a bread server, i have used it for vegetables, fruit salads, dessert pieces, etc. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Cathy

customer_reviews.title: Perfect serving bowl and spoon!
customer_reviews.text: I love this bowl. Am always looking for an appropriate serving bowl for jelled cranberry sauce - this is perfect. The serving spoon is fantastic also.
customer_reviews.author: BABs

customer_reviews.title: made in china
customer_reviews.text: I am really sorry that this dish is made in china and not UK. Normally I wouldn't buy this but I figured I would only use it at Christmastime so it would be ok. It looks ok although not the same quality as my made in UK dishes
customer_reviews.author: picadilly

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful dish
customer_reviews.text: This little dish and spoon are a jewel. I used it today for Christmas dinner for cranberry sauce and it was not only functional but beautiful on the table. It also didn’t take up too much space. It’s a real value for Spode.
customer_reviews.author: Pennie Allen

customer_reviews.title: My husband loved it! He was raised with Spode but he ...
customer_reviews.text: My husband loved it! He was raised with Spode but he really wanted it because he thinks it's funny to celebrate the birth of Christ with "deviled " eggs!
customer_reviews.author: Teresa M. Gray

customer_reviews.title: BAD PACKING-BROKEN LADLE
customer_reviews.text: The ladle was broken when it arrived. There is no real protection for the ladle. It's curvy and should have had layers of bubble wrap but the pieces were just laying in some holes in the cardboard top that I guess was supposed to cradle it. Anyway. Returning this one. Ordered another. Hope. Pray. ......
customer_reviews.author: Marta

customer_reviews.title: It is Spode Christmas!
customer_reviews.text: I received this as a gift to add to my large collection of Christmas Spode, love it!
customer_reviews.author: Rosemarie Kleinberg

customer_reviews.title: Good present with pie
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for a friend. I filled it with apple rhubarb pie and presented it at Christmas. It baked well and my friends loved it!
customer_reviews.author: L. Wasser

customer_reviews.title: Well received gift
customer_reviews.text: A great addition to our Spode collection. Perfect for my homemade cranberry sauce
customer_reviews.author: J. Hilson

customer_reviews.title: Returned
customer_reviews.text: Received a blue Ikea bowl in the Spode Christmas Tree pie plate box. Bummer!
customer_reviews.author: Diane Ramsey

customer_reviews.title: Arrived damaged
customer_reviews.text: Spode is a great product and my mother has a nice collection wanted to add the devil egg plate to it but it arrived broken. Very upsetting. No protection in the package to Keep it from braking. I will not be buying Spode from Amazon again
customer_reviews.author: Erin Spencer

customer_reviews.title: Love this! This might be my favorite Spode purchase ...
customer_reviews.text: Love this! This might be my favorite Spode purchase of the year. I think it is the perfect size for cranberry sauce. I love the spoon with a tree design in the silver-plated part. I like that the sides of the dish are high so there is no concern about cranberry sauce or juice sliding out/falling onto the table.
customer_reviews.author: ajc2016Phila

customer_reviews.title: nice piece but not packed well
customer_reviews.text: Got it in the mail the other day and when I opened the box the ladle was broken not packed well the ladle was just sitting on top of the box. You would think that a item as fragile as that they would take great care in packing it safe. Still waiting to hear from the warehouse as per a replacement it's been 5 days and still waiting? love the tureen but would love it much more in one piece. will update this again
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Labate

customer_reviews.title: Gotta love Spose
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect size for cranberry sauce or vegetables. Love it
customer_reviews.author: PaulaJean

customer_reviews.title: As Depicted
customer_reviews.text: Very nice dish and serving piece for the price. Dish is made in China.
customer_reviews.author: GK1118

customer_reviews.title: and she liked it. it is of course
customer_reviews.text: i bought this for my mother, and she liked it. it is of course, of spode's usual quality work. she said it was lovely, and well packaged, although she wasn't aware that such a thing as a cranberry bowl existed. my father started getting her something from spode for her christmas dishes some time ago, and when he passed away i continued the tradition.
customer_reviews.author: qfalconer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: This is a wonderful piece of china that I plan to display as a focal piece on my buffet table each Christmas and I am already looking forward to having it displayed again next year. I thought owning something this beautiful in the Spode pattern would be more expensive and I am pleased it was in a range in which I felt I could splurge. I am extremely happy with it and recommend it to anyone who loves this pattern and enjoys a piece of china that was so popular in days past.
customer_reviews.author: Lossie Elizabeth Nell

customer_reviews.title: First item broken, replacement faulty
customer_reviews.text: The first tureen ordered arrived with a box that had obviously been previously opened and missing the ladle. The item was sent back to Amazon and a replacement issued. However, the replacement is faulty - the bowl of the ladle is tilted/skewed on the base as if it were a factory second. Here we go again....
customer_reviews.author: GramFall4

customer_reviews.title: Christmas decor
customer_reviews.text: Will enjoy this item because it matches other Christmas BOWLS AND TRAYS AND MOST IMPORTANT , its perfect for Cranberry sauce .
customer_reviews.author: Barbara

customer_reviews.title: Love this! Add it to your collection!
customer_reviews.text: Love love love! It’s not made in England but it’s exactly what I wanted and needed!
customer_reviews.author: Joshua C.

customer_reviews.title: That available on amazon.com at fair price.
customer_reviews.text: I collect above pattern, and will use it every chirstmas dinner. Maybe thur out the rest of the year.
customer_reviews.author: Gail Owen

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for condiments!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful little dish for serving condiments and snacks. Perfect for nuts during the holidays. Spoons are sturdy and durable.
customer_reviews.author: Diane K. Crow

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful but damaged
customer_reviews.text: The item was beautiful. I bought this for my best friend for Christmas. She told me at church yesterday, 1/8/16, the label was crushed inside the item.
customer_reviews.author: Shelia P. Smith

customer_reviews.title: I love spode..I love this.
customer_reviews.text: I love Spode Christmas dishes. I love this. It is beautiful. I am sure it will look lovely on my Christmas table among all my other Spode serving pieces. It can be used for other than cranberry sauce. I really like the spoon.
customer_reviews.author: Elyn

customer_reviews.title: Pretty, BUT you can not put a pie in ...
customer_reviews.text: Pretty, BUT you can not put a pie in it and cook it. Very disappointed, so I had to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Barbann

customer_reviews.title: The second shipment arrived very quickly and without broken pieces ...
customer_reviews.text: The second shipment arrived very quickly and without broken pieces. It was quite the mess to ship the broken one back.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy L.

customer_reviews.title: ... the little spoon was broke the second one came perfect will enjoy using it at holiday
customer_reviews.text: Had to send the first one back because the little spoon was broke the second one came perfect will enjoy using it at holiday.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Did not use this year, but next Christmas, ...
customer_reviews.text: Did not use this year, but next Christmas, definitely. I'll probably order another as I am already planning 2017's menu!
customer_reviews.author: Gregg

customer_reviews.title: Way smaller than it looks in the picture.
customer_reviews.text: The picture Is misleading. It's so small I can't imagine what you will use it for. String beans wouldn't fit in this thing.
customer_reviews.author: Marta

customer_reviews.title: loved this purchase
customer_reviews.text: as always, spode pieces are wonderful. the size of this bowl was perfect. serving ladle is beautiful. holiday meals will look great in future.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Capwell

customer_reviews.title: This dish is a good size for sliced cranberry sauce
customer_reviews.text: This dish is a good size for sliced cranberry sauce, and I love that it comes with the server spoon.
customer_reviews.author: Zara

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful bread plate
customer_reviews.text: My daughter in law wanted it for her birthday. It was exactly as described.
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn O. Walsh

customer_reviews.title: Arrived promptly and in perfect condition!!!
customer_reviews.text: Arrived in perfect condition, and is so beautiful. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth M. Metcalfe

customer_reviews.title: broken spoon
customer_reviews.text: One of the spoons came broken I just found out. Please send out a new one right away. Thank you Arlene Barjam

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful gift. My sister squealed in delight and poured cranberries in it right away.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, classy Christmas platter
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful Christmas platter! I thought it was a very good deal.

customer_reviews.title: SPODE EGG DISH
customer_reviews.text: VERY PRETTY--I'M GIVING AS A GIFT AND I THINK THEY WILL LOVE IT.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Quality and design perfect for intended use at Christmas dinner.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: so cute!
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect for Cranberry sauce or just about anything you would want to serve in it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Another wonderful collection of the Spode Christmas Tree china. Love how the design is captured in the shape of the platter.

customer_reviews.title: Get her a fun extra piece each year
customer_reviews.text: Early gift to daughter who has large Spode collection (36 years). Get her a fun extra piece each year. Loved it!
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth A. Pulice

customer_reviews.title: Great addition to any collection.
customer_reviews.text: My order came quickly and arrived in tact. Devilled eggs are a surprisingly popular addition to gatherings...even Christmas. So I was very happy to add this to my collection.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful & Versital!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent addition to my Spode collection & the serving spoon can be used for serving various foods as well as the cranberry dish can also be used to bake banana but bread. Beautiful & versital.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: This dish is perfect for one or two people. I love the two spoons for serving.
customer_reviews.author: SHIRLEY H.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: A great dish! I thought it would be bigger, but still a great dish!
customer_reviews.author: stewart b rollins

customer_reviews.title: Will be nice not to have the juice running where we don't ...
customer_reviews.text: Daughter looking forward to using this next Christmas. Will be nice not to have the juice running where we don't want it.
customer_reviews.author: RStevens

customer_reviews.title: Looks Great!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is a perfect piece when you want to impress your guests and make soup a course at your Christmas dinner. It is a great sze and made the impression I was hoping for.
customer_reviews.author: William R. Hazelrigg

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size...perfect shape
customer_reviews.text: My Pfaltzgraf Christmas set is no longer being produced...so I have looked for additions to my Christmas set that look similar. Found this beautiful bread-basket after Christmas and can't wait to use. It arrived well packaged.
customer_reviews.author: Pepper

customer_reviews.title: Spode Christmas tree dishes.
customer_reviews.text: Loved getting the soup tureen of Spode Christmas tree dishes to add to my collection. I know I will love using it.
customer_reviews.author: Betsey Owens

customer_reviews.title: Christmas in February? Oh yes!
customer_reviews.text: Christmas shopping you say? When I saw this great stoneware on sale, I bought three, one for my brother and two for my two sisters. It looks very nice, a basket bowl I would be proud to place on my buffet.
customer_reviews.author: Mia Grace

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Gave it as a Christmas gift and the people loved it.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Englishman-Sarno

customer_reviews.title: alot smaller than i thot  it  would  be
customer_reviews.text: i did use it to hold 2 cans of sliced cranberry sauce and it was perfect ! good for holding canapes too.
customer_reviews.author: maggie merrill

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: It was a lot smaller than I thought it would be.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Lang

customer_reviews.title: christmas tree bread basket
customer_reviews.text: very nice item in the great christmas tree design - very well packed - quick sending - thanks - soon again
customer_reviews.author: C Rex

customer_reviews.title: christmas tree
customer_reviews.text: my love is the christmas season....for me, it's year-round...and i especially love the christmas "tree".....so as long as there's a "tree" i am satisfied....
customer_reviews.author: BILL F. DIMEO

customer_reviews.title: The Tureen is great!
customer_reviews.text: Tureen arrived great and is still great just as you would expect. However, I had read that the ladles were broken and I just hoped mine would be in tact. Now here is the thing, the broken pieces were not all in the plastic holding the ladle. This tells me it was packaged and shipped KNOWING that it was broken. My starts are not for the quality but for the people who sent it out knowingly with it broken. A ladle to replace it currently can cost equal to the set or more on Ebay. I am ashamed of Amazon for still selling this set.
customer_reviews.author: Atheena

customer_reviews.title: Perfect.
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect for cranberry sauce! I love it and I know my family will think it is unique!
customer_reviews.author: Randi

customer_reviews.title: Simply Elegant
customer_reviews.text: As stated, simply elegant. The colors are true; and the weight is substantial, it will add so much to our holiday table. Very satisfied with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia Middleton

customer_reviews.title: Perfect unique gift for the Spode Collector!
customer_reviews.text: My mother collects Spode Christmas Tree and has for years! I was delighted to find this Cranberry Bowl with the unique spoon for her for Christmas! Seller offered prompt service, new item in box, fast Amazon Prime shipping sent to third party address, will do business again. Happy New Year!
customer_reviews.author: R. Felver

customer_reviews.title: A sweet gift
customer_reviews.text: I gave this as a house warming gift for a family who moved a distance at Christmas. They were very happy as it was not only to remember us, but the only Christmas decoration they had since their furnishings hadn’t arrived. It made the family happy!
customer_reviews.author: ML

customer_reviews.title: Broken
customer_reviews.text: Everything was great but the matching spoon was broken in half. :(
customer_reviews.author: Irene Deiston

customer_reviews.title: BEAUTIFUL!
customer_reviews.text: ITS HUGE and possibly my favorite set to date! It arrived in perfect condition and all in original packaging.
customer_reviews.author: Kimmi

customer_reviews.title: Can be used for more than cranberries!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great size side dish. I bought this as a gift but I’m thinking of buying another for myself.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and functional
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful and functional, this pie plate is a welcome addition to our kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: John A. Leraas

customer_reviews.title: I wanted to love this
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to love this, but the finish again was not done properly. Still, it is serviceable.
customer_reviews.author: Struan

customer_reviews.title: The recipient loved it! It was perfect
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the Spode Christmas Tree Cranberry Bowl with Slotted Spoon as a Christmas gift. The recipient loved it! It was perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela

customer_reviews.title: Unique, gorgeous deviled egg Spode dish. Classic.
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely gorgeous deviled egg dish. Company packed it very well to avoid breakage during shipping. Very nice!

customer_reviews.title: I love spode serving pieces
customer_reviews.text: I used at my christmas dinner. I love spode serving pieces!
customer_reviews.author: BERNADETTE A

customer_reviews.title: Christmas Cookies
customer_reviews.text: I decided I wanted a plate just to put some cookies on for the holidays and this definitely fit the bill. For a platter, I thought it was smaller than I expected but it was great for cookies.
customer_reviews.author: Lawrence Harris

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love. My Spode cranberry container to put on my table with all my other Christmas Spode dishes.

customer_reviews.title: ladle came broken. I ordered it in the summer ...
customer_reviews.text: ladle came broken. I ordered it in the summer & did check it until Christmas. Too late to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Pat Searl

customer_reviews.title: Very pretty dish.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my daughter for first Christmas as a new bride.
customer_reviews.author: Rostie

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely lovely
customer_reviews.text: I love my Tureen. We serve Pasta e Fagiole on Christmas Eve and this was perfect. Completes my table setting!
customer_reviews.author: VickiAnne

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: Love it... we have a big family, so we use it not for soup but for gravy at our big family gatherings... Perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Better than the Nikko
customer_reviews.text: We have the Nikko pattern and due to the specs I was looking forward to that pie plate more (it was allegedly larger and deeper). This is the larger plate, truly 10" in diameter and a bit deeper. It also has a little more heft, so I feel less like it will easily break (though I doubt either would easily break). Anyway, if I were to buy another, this would be the one over the Nikko.
customer_reviews.author: J. Robinson

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love it!!!!! Perfect addition to my holiday serving dishes. Love Spode Christmas tree
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent addition to the collection
customer_reviews.text: Gave this to my Mom for Christmas and it was wonderful. She has almost the entire collection so it is nice to get new items for her.

customer_reviews.title: christmas present
customer_reviews.text: People in the USA got the pieces in time and they enjoy them very much
customer_reviews.author: cris

customer_reviews.title: Great Dish to Add to My Collection!
customer_reviews.text: I collect the Spode Christmas Tree pattern, and this was a great addition to my collection. I think it can be used for bread or a serving for a small side dish. I can't wait to use it at Christmas this year!
customer_reviews.author: S.

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a fri end who collects this pattern. She was thrilled and I was pleased at the great price I found on Amazon.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and good price - shipped well too
customer_reviews.text: I got this as a gift for christmas - she loved it - each year I add one more piece to her collection !

product_meta.title: Spode Christmas Tree-Shaped Platter
product_meta.description: Style Name:Christmas Tree-Shaped PlatterSpode Christmas Tree is an invitation to a charming table that becomes a family tradition as your collection and memories grow. Spode is well-known for its unique yet functional shapes in dinnerware. The generously sized Tree Shaped Platter is a great addition to your buffet using this fun, sophisticated, whimsical shape. The Tree Shaped Platter measures 14 inches.
feature_bullets: Christmas Tree is a holiday classic, traditional and collectible
Great gift for family and friends

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S. Learn More
specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.8 out of 5 stars258 ratings4.8 out of 5 stars
